summary: This is an email chain from August 30, 2021, discussing a Daily Beast article about Prince Andrew being a 'person of interest' in the SDNY's Epstein investigation. The sender notes a generic State Department quote and expresses confusion about the reported SDNY action regarding Andrew.

persons.name: Andrew
persons.role: Person of interest / witness in Epstein probe
persons.context: Referred to as a 'person of interest' and at least a witness in the SDNY Epstein investigation, with pressure reportedly being piled on him.

events.title: SDNY reports Andrew as person of interest
events.description: The SDNY reportedly sought to pile pressure on Prince Andrew by reporting he was a 'person of interest' in the Epstein probe and considered at least a witness.

keyFacts: An August 2021 Daily Beast article reported the SDNY stated Prince Andrew was a 'person of interest' in the Epstein investigation.
The email author expresses confusion, stating they and their team do not know what the referenced SDNY action is.
The document is internal correspondence reacting to media coverage of the ongoing Epstein probe's focus on Prince Andrew.
